mapper.select: insert into t_hcm_personaldata ( name, age, sex, education, company, position, techinicalrating, career, phone, mail, certificate, postcode, addr1, addr2 ) values ( #{name}, #{age}, #{sex}, #{education}, #{company}, #{position}, #{techinicalrating}, #{career}, #{phone}, #{mail}, #{certificate}, #{postcode}, #{addr1}, #{addr2} )

insert into t_hcm_projectcareer ( idx, pro_tit, pro_detail, pro_term1, pro_term2, pro_part, pro_reference, pro_technic ) values ( (select max(idx) from t_hcm_personaldata), #{pro_tit}, #{pro_detail}, #{pro_term1}, #{pro_term2}, #{pro_part}, #{pro_reference}, #{pro_technic} )
select max(pc.pro_term2) as pro_term2, pd.idx, pd.name, pd.techinicalrating, pd.career from t_hcm_personaldata pd, t_hcm_projectcareer pc where pd.idx = pc.idx group by pc.idx
